org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal

Class CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, PrincipalAttributesRepository

    public final class CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository
extends Object
implements PrincipalAttributesRepository, Closeable
    Wrapper around an attribute repository where attributes cached for a configurable period.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository

        public CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository(long expiryDuration)
        Instantiates a new caching attributes principal factory. Caches the attributes based on duration units of DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_UNIT and the given time.
        Parameters:
        expiryDuration - the expiry duration based on the unit of DEFAULT_CACHE_EXPIRATION_UNIT

      • CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository

        public CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository(TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                    long expiryDuration)
        Instantiates a new caching attributes principal factory.
        Parameters:
        timeUnit - the time unit
        expiryDuration - the expiry duration

        Parameters:
        duration - the duration

      • setMergingStrategy

        public void setMergingStrategy(CachingPrincipalAttributesRepository.MergingStrategy mergingStrategy)
        The merging strategy that deals with existing principal attributes and those that are retrieved from the source. By default, existing attributes are ignored and the source is always consulted.
        Parameters:
        mergingStrategy - the strategy to use for conflicts
